text: Undeservedly privileged to be able to enroll in the #Phase4 study of the @BioNTech_Group #COVID19 #vaccine. Hoping this #mRNA technology will be successful with an #HIV vaccine (p24 target?) and that this will become a #PeoplesVaccine accessible to all. @PIDSociety @IDSAInfo https://t.co/f5y4nvnzOK
